text: Dacia Soraya Valent (12 February 1963 - 22 January 2015) was a Somali-born Italian politician. She was a Member of the European Parliament from 1989 through 1994. She was born in Mogadishu, Somalia. Valent died in Rome, Italy from a heart attack, aged 51. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official blog * Dacia Valent profile from the European Parliament Website Category:1963 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Italian communist politicians Category:MEPs for Italy Category:People from Mogadishu Category:Police officers
title: Dacia Valent
